[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces”][vc_column]

Think Future Join this revolution of new age technology with the University and Industry backed program at SDBI Know more Think Data Science Admission Open for Bsc, Msc & PG [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1620115807750{margin-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_raw_html el_class=”mylogin”][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1593819286593{margin-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Welcome to School of Data Science and Business Intelligence” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln” css=”.vc_custom_1593819935769{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”16251″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]Founded in 2018, SDBI is a premier school offering programs in Data Science, AI, ML, and Business Intelligence. SDBI in association with leading universities offers B.Sc. and M.Sc. Degree in Data Science and Business Analytics curated by top industry experts. We aim to achieve a perfect blend of theory, case studies, and hands-on practice for our students to bridge the gap between academics and industry needs.

Our courses are designed by industry leaders to prepare students for next generation skills like data analytics, data visualisation, machine learning, artificial intelligence, natural language processing, etc. making them job ready. We are driven by our pursuit of excellence in teaching, innovation, research, technology, and a continually evolving academic environment. Our campus is at the renowned Patkar Varde College, Mumbai accredited with ‘A+ Grade’ by NAAC. All our degrees are offered under the prestigious University of Mumbai.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1593821261657{padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Courses Offered by SDBI” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln” css=”.vc_custom_1593819943691{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_tta_tour style=”flat” color=”white” spacing=”10″ gap=”10″ active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Bachelors” tab_id=”bachelors-course”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”Bachelors in Data Science and Business Analytics” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln” css=”.vc_custom_1593821162317{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]B.Sc. in Data science is a three years full-time undergraduate course that facilitates one to learn the industry-driven comprehensive curriculum at an early stage of his/her career.

Students learn, hone and apply their analytical and coding skills, collaborate in on a fast-paced atmosphere and learn from mentors coming from industry and academia.

  • Mandatory Internship
  • Industry connect sessions
  • 10+ Programming Tools and Languages
  • Capstone projects and 15+ case studies

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”View Course” style=”flat” color=”pink” size=”lg” align=”left” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fsdbi.in%2Fbachelors-in-data-science-and-business-analytics%2F|title:Bachelors%20%E2%80%93%20New||”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Masters” tab_id=”masters-course”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”Master’s in Data Science and Business Analytics” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln” css=”.vc_custom_1593821212799{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]M.Sc. in Data Science is a two years full-time postgraduate course that enables comprehensive learning with hands-on experience in solving real-life problems through interactive lectures, tutorials and practical coursework.

Students receive exposure to the latest tools and analytical methods to work with, derive insights from, deal with complex and unstructured data, and solve real-world problems.

  • Mandatory internships
  • Placement assistance
  • Mentorship of top data talent
  • Capstone projects and case studies

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”View Course” style=”flat” color=”pink” size=”lg” align=”left” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fsdbi.in%2Fmasters-in-data-science-and-business-analytics%2F|title:Bachelors%20%E2%80%93%20New||”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”PG Diploma” tab_id=”pg-diploma-course”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”PG Diploma in Data Science and Business Analytics” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln” css=”.vc_custom_1593821237388{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]PG Diploma in Data Science is a one-year course meant for graduates and full-time working professionals to upskill themselves and become eligible for lucrative job prospects.

The course is structured around subjects such as statistical Computational methods, data analytics, machine learning and database management to help you build your career in advanced Analytics.

  • Diploma degree from MU
  • Gateway to international studies by completing 16 years of Education
  • 20+ Industry Projects
  • Dedicated Student Mentor

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”View Course” style=”flat” color=”pink” size=”lg” align=”left” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fsdbi.in%2Fpg-diploma-in-data-science-and-business-analytics%2F|title:Bachelors%20%E2%80%93%20New||”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tour][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1594075371400{background-color: #413f3f !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Advisory Board” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1593913307247{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”16408″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-center txt-white”]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”16275″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded” css=”.vc_custom_1594075825691{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-center”]

Francis Pinto

CTO, Edulab

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1594256280904{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://sdbi.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/bg-academic-partners.jpg?id=16430) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”International Academia Partner” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”txt-white” css=”.vc_custom_1594322171219{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”16439″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Introducing Dual Degree in Data Science” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:30px|text_align:left|line_height:40px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”txt-white” css=”.vc_custom_1594302912722{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-white”]Bachelors Degree: 2 years at SDBI + 2 years at UNIC campus

Masters Degree: 1 semester at SDBI + 2 semesters at UNIC campus[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”About UNIC” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:30px|text_align:left|line_height:40px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”txt-white” css=”.vc_custom_1594302954466{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-white”]Largest University in Southern Europe that teaches primarily in English.

Ranked 42nd Best University in the world and #1 in the world for Blockchain and Digital Currency.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Read More” style=”outline” color=”danger” size=”sm” align=”left” width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”17156″ img_size=”200*100″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1594076917868{background-image: url(https://sdbi.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/bg-testimonials.jpg?id=16400) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Hear from Our Students” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

  • Rakhee Singh,

    It has been a great experience to be a part of SDBI. It has given me truest friends, ever helping professors and confidence to face any situation in my life. I am thankful to Placement cell for providing fair and ample amount of opportunities to us.

  • Dhiren Patel,

    Post my graduation, I started looking out for Master’s Course in Data Science since it has been creating such a buzz and that is when I decided to pursue it under SDBI and I must say that post first sem, I got convinced that I had made the right choice. The course, its pedagogy, and professors ensured that we learned the subjects thoroughly.

  • Viraj Purandare,

    As a kid, I was always inclined towards practical subjects like Maths and Science, I was never fond of mugging up the concepts. This is the reason why I love coding, its logical and statistical. Being a part of SDBI has been the greatest decision of my life so far, and I cannot wait to see what the future holds for me to unlock.

  • Yogesh Jadhav,

    The Applied M.Sc. in Data Science and Business Analytics is versatile enough to show us a wide range of paths to take afterwards. Now I am clear about which one to follow so I am focusing my efforts on that.

  • Samyak Sheth,

    SDBI believes in “Think Big, Think Beyond.” The entire team of SDBI puts an amazing effort in shaping our dreams into wonderful opportunities for us. All the teachings here are a complete mixture of theory, practicality and a list full of real-world examples which makes learning easy and interesting.

  • Gayatri Deshpande,

    The course content is expansive and well structured, organised in six semester patterns to make ensure stepwise growth in the field. The course is designed in a way that enables not only classroom learning through lecture method and seminars by people working in the Industry, but it also enables us to take up internships of our choice to apply what we learn.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1594713708758{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #df3735 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”The Fourth Industrial Revolution is already here.” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:45px|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:55px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1594713985017{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Do you have what it takes to survive?” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:38px|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:48px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1620131671271{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_btn title=”Register Now” style=”flat” color=”white” size=”lg” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-chevron-circle-right” add_icon=”true” link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fadmission.sdbi.in%2F%23%2Fauth%2Fregister|title:Register%20Now|target:_blank|rel:nofollow”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
